attributes.action: Extend the Online safety bill to include online scams
attributes.additional_details:
Since the start of the pandemic, I've noticed a significant increase in fraudulent emails and text messages and whilst I'm tech savy, not everyone is and scams are constantly changing.

According to Action Fraud figures, £1.7 billion was lost to scams in the past year, while estimates for the year to June 2020 reveal that 85% of all fraud was cyber-enabled. (Money saving expert).
attributes.background: Online platforms, such as search engines and social media sites, to be given a legal responsibility to protect users from fake and fraudulent content on their sites that lead to scams.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Extend the Online Safety Bill’s protections against online scams
